Title: Authorizes child care assistance to be made available to certain victims of domestic violence
Summary: Authorizes child care assistance to be made available to certain victims of domestic violence who are in need of assistance in order for a parent or caretaker relative to engage in work or participate in work activities.
LawCode: Amd ยง410-w, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to child care assistance for victims of domestic violence
